3.3.zh-CN: 本回合中，目标角色下一次元素爆发造成的伤害+3。（每回合每个角色最多食用1次「料理」）

3.7.zh-CN:
为所附属角色提供3点护盾。
此护盾耗尽前：所附属角色造成的火元素伤害+1。

结束阶段：对所附属角色造成1点火元素伤害。
可用次数：1

角色进行重击时：少花费1个火元素。（每回合1次）
结束阶段：本角色附属丹火印。

持续回合：2

3.7.zh-CN: 本回合中，所有我方角色下次受到的伤害-2。（每回合每个角色最多食用1次「料理」）

所附属角色普通攻击后：治疗所有我方角色1点。

持续回合：2
3.5.en-US: The character to which this is attached has their Normal Attacks deal +1 DMG. After the character to which this attached uses a Normal Attack: Heal 1 HP for all your characters.

其他我方角色使用「元素爆发」后：累积1点「愿力」。（最多累积3点）
所附属角色使用奥义·梦想真说时：消耗所有「愿力」，每点「愿力」使造成的伤害+1。
3.7.en-US: After your other characters use Elemental Bursts: Gain 1 Resolve. (Max 3) When the character to which this is attached uses Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu: Consume all Resolve and deal +1 DMG per Resolve.

4.0.zh-CN:
此状态初始具有2层「引雷」；重复附属时，叠加1层「引雷」。「引雷」最多可以叠加到4层。
结束阶段：叠加1层「引雷」。

所附属角色受到苍雷伤害时：移除此状态，每层「引雷」使伤害+1。
4.0.en-US: This status starts with 2 stacks of Conductive. When attached repeatedly, Conductive stack +1. Conductive can be stacked to a maximum of 4 stacks. End Phase: Accumulate 1 stack of Conductive. When the character attached with Conductive takes DMG from Violet Arc: Remove this status and DMG +1 for each stack of Conductive.

所附属角色元素战技和元素爆发造成的伤害+1。
可用次数：2
3.5.en-US: The character with this attached deals +1 Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG.

3.3.zh-CN:
所附属角色造成的物理伤害变为冰元素伤害，使所附属角色造成的冰元素伤害+1。
持续回合：2
3.3.en-US: When the charactor to which it is attached to deals Physical Damage, it will be turned into Cryo DMG, and Cryo DMG dealt by the charactor +1.

3.3.zh-CN:
所附属角色造成的物理伤害变为冰元素伤害。
（持续到回合结束）
3.3.en-US: When the charactor to which it is attached to deals Physical Damage, it will be turned into CRYO DMG.

3.7.en-US: When the character to which this is attached would be defeated: Remove this effect, ensure the character will not be defeated, and heal them to _HEAL_ HP.

根据「凭依」级数，提供效果：
大于等于2级：物理伤害转化为雷元素伤害；
大于等于4级：造成的伤害+2；

大于等于6级时：「凭依」级数-4

我方单手剑、双手剑或长柄武器角色造成的物理伤害变为水元素伤害。
我方切换角色后：造成1点水元素伤害。（每回合1次）

持续回合：2
3.8.en-US: Your characters' Normal Attacks deal +1 DMG. Your Sword, Claymore, and Polearm-wielding characters' Physical DMG is converted to Hydro DMG. After you switch characters, you deal 1 Hydro DMG. (Once per Round).

4.2.zh-CN: 行动阶段开始时：生成无郤气护盾。
4.2.en-US: When Action Phase begins: Create Seamless Shield.

3.3.zh-CN:
我方角色使用技能后：造成2点火元素伤害。
可用次数：2
3.3.en-US: After your character uses a Skill: Deal 2 Pyro DMG.

4.2.zh-CN:
我方出战角色受到至少为2的伤害时：抵消1点伤害。
可用次数：2
4.2.en-US: When your active character receives at least 2 DMG: Decrease DMG taken by 1.

3.3.zh-CN:
我方出战角色受到至少为3的伤害时：抵消1点伤害。
可用次数：2
3.3.en-US: When your active character receives at least 3 DMG: Decrease DMG taken by 1.

4.2.zh-CN:
我方出战角色受到至少为2的伤害时：抵消1点伤害。
可用次数：2
4.2.en-US: When your active character receives at least 2 DMG: Decrease DMG taken by 1.

3.3.zh-CN:
我方出战角色受到至少为3的伤害时：抵消1点伤害。
可用次数：2
3.3.en-US: When your active character receives at least 3 DMG: Decrease DMG taken by 1.

3.3.zh-CN:
我方角色普通攻击后：造成1点水元素伤害
可用次数：3
3.3.en-US: After your character uses a Normal Attack: Deal 1 Hydro DMG.

3.6.zh-CN:
我方角色普通攻击后：造成1点水元素伤害
可用次数：3
3.6.en-US: After your character uses a Normal Attack: Deal 1 Hydro DMG.

3.7.zh-CN: 为我方出战角色提供1点护盾。（可叠加）
3.7.en-US: Grants 1 Shield point to defend your active charactor. (Can stack. Max 2 Points.)

3.7.zh-CN: 本回合不能再使用复活「料理」事件牌。
3.7.en-US: You cannot revive any charactor with food this round.

3.8.zh-CN: 我方下次打出「武器」或「圣遗物」手牌时：少花费1个元素骰。
3.8.en-US: The next time you play a Weapon or Artifact from your hand: Spend 1 less Elemental Die.

4.2.zh-CN: 提供1点护盾，保护我方出战角色。此效果被移除，或被重复生成时：造成1点草元素伤害，治疗我方出战角色1点。
4.2.en-US: Provides 1 Shield, protecting your active character. When this effect is removed, or generated again: Deal 1 Dendro DMG, and heal your active character for 1 HP.

3.7.zh-CN:
我方引发元素反应时：伤害额外+1。
持续回合：2
3.7.en-US: When your character triggers an Elemental Reaction: +1 Additional DMG.

3.4.zh-CN:
所在阵营的角色使用技能后：对所在阵营的出战角色造成2点火元素伤害。
可用次数：2
3.4.en-US: After a character to which Sparks 'n' Splash is attached uses a Skill: Deals 2 Pyro DMG to their team's active character. Usage(s): 2

3.7.zh-CN: 下回合行动阶段开始时：生成3点万能元素。（牌组包含至少2个「璃月」角色，才能加入牌组）
3.7.en-US: When the Action Phase of the next Round begins: Create 3 Omni Element.

3.7.zh-CN:
我方执行「切换角色」时：少花费1个元素骰。风域触发后，本回合中我方角色下次「普通攻击」少花费1个无色元素。
可用次数：2
3.7.en-US: When you perform "Switch Character": Spend 1 less Elemental Die. After this effect is triggered, your next Normal Attack this round will cost 1 less Unaligned Element. Usage(s): 2

3.7.zh-CN:
我方执行「切换角色」时：少花费1个元素骰。
可用次数：2
3.7.en-US: When you perform "Switch Character": Spend 1 less Elemental Die. Usage(s): 2

3.7.zh-CN:
我方选择行动前：造成3点雷元素伤害。
可用次数：1
3.7.en-US: Before you choose your action: Deal 3 Electro DMG.

3.4.zh-CN:
我方角色普通攻击后：造成1点雷元素伤害。
我方出战角色受到至少为3的伤害时：抵消其中1点伤害。

持续回合：2
3.4.en-US: After your character uses a Normal Attack: Deal 1 Electro DMG. When your character receives at least 3 DMG: Decrease DMG taken by 1.

3.3.zh-CN: 我方下一次使用技能后：将下一个我方后台角色切换到场上。
3.3.en-US: The next time you use a Skill: Switch your next character in to be the active character.

4.0.zh-CN: 将一个我方角色所装备的「武器」返回手牌。本回合中，我方下次打出「武器」手牌时：少花费2个元素骰。
4.0.en-US: During this Round, the next time you play a Weapon card: Spend 2 less Elemental Dice.

3.7.zh-CN: 本回合中，轮到我方行动期间有对方角色被击倒时：本次行动结束后，我方可以再连续行动一次。可用次数：1（牌组包含至少2个「蒙德」角色，才能加入牌组）
3.7.en-US: In this Round, when an opposing character is defeated during your Action, you can continue to act again when that Action ends. Usage(s): 1

4.1.zh-CN: 本回合中，我方使用技能后：将下一个我方后台角色切换到场上。（牌组包含至少2个「蒙德」角色，才能加入牌组）
4.1.en-US: The next time you use a Skill: Switch your next character in to be the active character.

3.7.zh-CN: 本回合中，我方角色下一次普通攻击少花费1无色元素。
3.7.en-US: During this round, your charactor's next Normal Attack costs 1 less Unaligned Element.

3.7.zh-CN: 角色造成的伤害+1。我方角色引发元素反应时：造成的伤害+1。（每回合最多触发2次）（「法器」角色才能装备。角色最多装备1件「武器」）
3.7.en-US: The character deals +1 DMG. When your character triggers an Elemental Reaction: Deal +1 DMG. (Twice per Round)

3.7.zh-CN: 角色造成的伤害+1。角色使用原本元素骰费用+充能费用至少为5的技能时，伤害额外+2。（每回合1次）（「弓」角色才能装备。角色最多装备1件「武器」）
3.7.en-US: The character deals +1 DMG. When the character uses a Skill that costs at least a total of 5 Elemental Dice and Energy, +2 additional DMG. (Once per Round)

3.3.zh-CN: 角色造成的伤害+1。角色使用「元素战技」后：角色额外获得1点充能。（每回合1次）（「单手剑」角色才能装备。角色最多装备1件「武器」）
3.3.en-US: The character deals +1 DMG. After the opposing character uses a Skill: If the character with this attached is the active character, heal this character for 1 HP. (Max twice per Round)

3.7.zh-CN: 角色造成的伤害+1。角色使用「元素爆发」后：生成「干年的大乐章·别离之歌」。（我方角色造成的伤害+1，持续回合：2）（「弓」角色才能装备。角色最多装备1件「武器」）
3.7.en-US: The character deals +1 DMG. After the character uses an Elemental Burst: Create Millennial Movement: Farewell Song. (Your character deals +1 DMG, Duration (Rounds): 2)

3.7.zh-CN: 角色造成的伤害+1。每回合自动触发1次：如果所附属角色没有充能，就使其获得1点充能。（「长柄武器」角色才能装备。角色最多装备1件「武器」）
3.7.en-US: The character deals +1 DMG. Triggers automatically once per Round: If the character to which this is attached does not have Energy, they will gain 1 Energy.

3.7.zh-CN: 角色造成的伤害+1。对方使用技能后：如果所附属角色为「出战角色」，则治疗该角色1点。（每回合至多2次）（「单手剑」角色才能装备。角色最多装备1件「武器」）
3.7.en-US: The character deals +1 DMG. After the character uses an Elemental Skill: The character gains one additional Energy. (Once per Round)

3.8.zh-CN: 角色造成的伤害+1。入场时：抓2张牌。（「法器」角色才能装备。角色最多装备1件「武器」）
3.8.en-US: The character deals +1 DMG. When played: Draw 2 cards.

4.0.zh-CN: 角色造成的伤害+1。入场时：所附属角色在本回合中，下次使用「元素战技」或装备「天赋」时少花费2个元素骰。（「弓」角色才能装备。角色最多装备1件「武器」）
4.0.en-US: The character deals +1 DMG. When played: The character to which this is attached will spend 2 less Elemental Dice next time they use an Elemental Skill or equip a Talent card.

3.3.en-US: The character deals +1 DMG. When played: For each alive party member from Liyue, grant 1 Shield point to the character to which this is attached. (Max 3 points)

3.7.zh-CN: 角色造成的伤害+1。入场时：队伍中每有一名「璃月」角色，此牌就为附属的角色提供1点护盾。（最多3点）（「长柄武器」角色才能装备。角色最多装备1件「武器」）
3.7.en-US: The character deals +1 DMG. When played: For each party member from Liyue, grant 1 Shield point to the character to which this is attached. (Max 3 points)

3.3.zh-CN: 角色造成的伤害+1。（「法器」角色才能装备。角色最多装备1件「武器」）
3.3.en-US: The character deals +1 DMG.

4.1.en-US: The character deals +1 DMG. When played: The character to which this is attached will spend 2 less Elemental Dice next time they use an Elemental Skill or equip a Talent card.

3.3.en-US: The character deals +1 DMG. After the character uses an Elemental Skill: Create 1 Elemental Die of the same Elemental Type as this character. (Once per Round)

3.3.en-US: The character deals +1 DMG. After the character uses an Elemental Skill: Create 1 Elemental Die of the same Elemental Type as this character. (Once per Round)

3.3.en-US: The character deals +1 DMG. After the character uses an Elemental Skill: Create 1 Elemental Die of the same Elemental Type as this character. (Once per Round)

3.3.en-US: The character deals +1 DMG. After the character uses an Elemental Skill: Create 1 Elemental Die of the same Elemental Type as this character. (Once per Round)

3.3.en-US: The character deals +1 DMG. Once per Round: This character's Normal Attack deal +1 additional DMG.

3.3.en-US: The character deals +1 DMG. Once per Round: This character's Normal Attack deal +1 additional DMG.

3.7.en-US: The character deals +1 DMG. Once per Round: This character's Normal Attack deal +1 additional DMG.

3.3.zh-CN: 角色造成的伤害+1。每回合1次：角色使用「普通攻击」造成的伤害额外+1。（「长柄武器」角色才能装备。角色最多装备1件「武器」）
3.3.en-US: The character deals +1 DMG. Once per Round: This character's Normal Attack deal +1 additional DMG.

3.7.zh-CN: 角色造成的伤害+1。角色使用技能后：为我方出战角色提供1点中「护盾」。（每回合1次，可叠加到2点）（「双手剑」角色才能装备。角色最多装备1件「武器」）
3.7.en-US: The character deals +1 DMG. After the character uses a skill: Gives 1 Shield point to your active character. (Once per Round, stacks up to 2 points)

3.3.zh-CN: 角色造成的伤害+1。（「单手剑」角色才能装备。角色最多装备1件「武器」）
3.3.en-US: The character deals +1 DMG.

3.7.zh-CN: 角色造成的伤害+1。角色如果在中护盾角色状态或护盾出战状态的保护下，则造成的伤害额外+1。角色使用「元素战技」后：如果我方存在提供「护盾」的出战状态，则为一个此类出战状态补充1点「护盾」。（每回合1次）（「长柄武器」角色才能装备。角色最多装备1件「武器」）
3.7.en-US: The character deals +1 DMG. When your active character is protected by a Shield Character Status or a Shield Combat Status, you deal +1 DMG. After the character uses an Elemental Skill: If you have a Combat Status that grants a Shield on your side, add 1 Shield point to that Combat Status. (Once per Round)

3.3.zh-CN: 角色造成的伤害+1。（「双手剑」角色才能装备。角色最多装备1件「武器」）

3.3.en-US: The character deals +1 DMG.

3.3.zh-CN: 角色造成的伤害+1。攻击剩余生命值不多于6的目标时，伤害额外+2。（「双手剑」角色才能装备。角色最多装备1件「武器」）
3.3.en-US: The character deals +1 DMG. Deal +2 additional DMG if the target's remaining HP is equal or less than 6.
